name: blowup $\AA^2_\QQ$ in origin

proofs.integral: The blowup can be covered by affine patches $\Spec \QQ[x, y, u] / (uy - x) \cong \Spec \QQ[y, u]$ and $\Spec \QQ[x, y, v] / (vx - y) \cong \Spec \QQ[x, v]$, both of which are integral.

description: The blowup of the affine plane in the origin, over the rational numbers.
